description:
Elaine is http://anidb.net/ch68859 [King]`s younger sister and the Holy Maiden who guarded the Fountain of Youth. She was killed by a demon in the Fairy King`s Forest after giving up the fountain to http://anidb.net/ch67156 [Ban]. She is approximately 1000 years old.
Source: Nanatsu no Taizai Wikia
name: Elaine
